name: PANOCHROMATICA-12
description: Panochromatica is an artificial metaverse of simple shapes, surfaces and combination of 4 colors. The space works as a trigger to activate the viewers notion of color as a volumetric part of metaspace, see shapes in formless textures and prismatic play of light in reflective nonexistent objects. In N-dimensional verses viewer will be all alone on his journey without any distractions of myths, cultural dogmas or system of thoughts.
